---
title: "inter_ticks"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = ">"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(saferGraph)
```
<br>

### Argument lim
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100))
```
<br>

### Argument log
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(1, 100), log = "log10")
```
<br>

### Argument breaks
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100), breaks = c(0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100))
```
<br>

### Argument n
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100), n = 5)
```
<br>

### Argument warn.print
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100), warn.print = TRUE)
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100), warn.print = FALSE)
```
<br>

### All the arguments
```{r}
inter_ticks(lim = c(0, 100), log = "log10", breaks = c(0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100), n = 5, warn.print = TRUE)
```
<br>
